execution_plan.description: Compute number of orders per customer from the Orders table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS orders_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;

execution_plan.description: Fetch gender for customers who have orders (customer_ids obtained in step 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, gender_code FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
